pages.title: Botania
pages.text: Botania is centered around generating and harnessing the magical energy produced by mystical flowers.$(br)Botania's documentation book, the Lexica Botania, displays crafting recipes and explains nearly everything about Botania in-game.$(br2)$(l:https://ftb.gamepedia.com/Botania)Botania Wiki$(/l)

pages.title: The Lexica Botania
pages.text: The lexicon is given to you when you first join the server. If you happen to lose this, refer to the crafting recipe above.$(br)Any sapling from any mod can be used in the recipe.
